content: this is a summary of a civil case that took place in the klaipeda district court the case involved two parties the defendant and the applicant but their names are not provided the defendant was ordered to pay €38114 for stamp duty and professional fees as well as an additional €192 for stamp duty the applicant was required to pay €208740 for stamp duty professional fees and court fees along with an extra €154 for stamp duty the court decided to dissolve the marriage and awarded each party a ½ share of the apartment the defendant was also awarded a skoda superb car while the applicant received a samsung mobile phone and cooking equipment the defendant was ordered to pay the applicant compensation of eur 6600 for their share of the bed and the bobcat tractor the court considered the credit obligation as a joint responsibility of both parties the text also mentions various articles related to matrimonial property in the civil code the court upheld the action and counterclaim in a divorce case between two parties mg and jg the court dissolved their marriage and awarded them specific shares of the apartment and personal property the court also recognized a third party as a creditor in a housing credit agreement the court dismissed some parts of the application and counterclaim both parties were ordered to pay stamp duty to the state
